newsitem.title: MOROCCO: Morocco to celebrate Eid al-Fitr on Sunday.
newsitem.headline: Morocco to celebrate Eid al-Fitr on Sunday.

text.p: Morocco said on Friday it will celebrate Eid al-Fitr marking the end of the fasting month of Ramadan starting on Sunday.
The state-run RTM television said it was not possible on Friday night to see the lunar crescent marking the start of the new month and therefore Eid will be on Sunday.
Sunday and Monday will be public and business holidays.
